title: Microsoft ancient lands (MAC)
brief_description: The ancient world is yours to explore. What was life like for soldiers, servants and kings? Discover through rich images, sound, animation and video, the mysteries and marvels of life in ancient times. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Any Macintosh computer that supports a 256 colour, 13 inch or higher resolution monitor; System 7 or later; 4Mb of memory; at least 1MB of available hard-disk space and a CD-ROM drive.
